schedule: Tokyo – Manila – Hanoi – Karachi – Basra – Berlin
circumstances: The crew was returning to Germany following a promotional tour in Far East. While approaching Manila, all four engines stopped. The Captain ditched the aircraft off Manille. All eight occupants were rescued and the aircraft named 'Brandenburg' was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause: It appears that the engine failure was caused by a mismanagement of the fuel system (fuel selector) on part of the crew.
